com.andrewreitz.spock.android

Annotation Type UseActivity


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface UseActivity
    Apply to Activities in Specifications in order to test activities. @UseActivity(MainActivity) def activity
    Since:
    1.1

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends android.app.Activity> value 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends BundleCreator> bundleCreator 
      ActivityRunMode runMode 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends android.app.Activity> value
        Returns:
        Provide the specific Activity type to be created for the test.

      • bundleCreator

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends BundleCreator> bundleCreator
        Returns:
        A BundleCreator that will create and pass a bundle to the Activity that is being created for testing.
        Default:
        com.andrewreitz.spock.android.extension.EmptyBundleCreator.class

      • runMode

        public abstract ActivityRunMode runMode
        Returns:
        Defines when Activity should be launched (SPECIFICATION - once per specification, METHOD - once per test method)
        Default:
        com.andrewreitz.spock.android.ActivityRunMode.SPECIFICATION
